jpen.owner
Interface PenClip

public interface PenClip

Defines the screen area where PenEvents are fired or a drag-out operation can be started.

Method Summary
 boolean contains(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Float point)
           
 void evalLocationOnScreen(java.awt.Point locationOnScreen)
          Evaluates the current location of this PenClip on the screen.
 

Method Detail

evalLocationOnScreen

void evalLocationOnScreen(java.awt.Point locationOnScreen)
Evaluates the current location of this PenClip on the screen. locationOnScreen is in screen coordinates and is the origin of this PenClip coordinates.

contains

boolean contains(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Float point)
Parameters:
point - The point to test in PenClip coordinates.
Returns:
true if the given point is inside this PenClip.
